items.text: back of a length on off, and angling into Rohit. Punched off the back foot to long off for a single
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: paddled fine! Almost Sachin-esque. Overpitched outside leg stump, and Dhawan slaps a paddle right past the keeper's right for four more runs. Poor bowling from Nazmul thus far
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Dhawan, FOUR runs

items.text: soft dismissal! And Nazmul does the naagin dance! Full outside off, and spinning away from Dhawan. Tries to drive this over mid off, but toe-ends it straight to Soumya Sarkar. There's the first wicket
items.postText: First time this series that India's opening partnership fell for less than 50
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Dhawan, OUT

dismissal.text: S Dhawan c Soumya Sarkar b Nazmul Islam 15 (14b 3x4 0x6) SR: 107.14

items.text: good length just outside off, but turns after hitting the deck. Rayudu taps this off the back foot to point
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Rayudu, no run

items.text: back of a length just outside off, and punched off the back foot to mid off. Can't beat the infield
items.postText: Mahesh Shewale: "Did Nazmul bowl consecutive chinamen to Shikhar ?" -- yep, he's been bowling wristspin to the left hander, and fingerspin to the right hander
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Rayudu, no run

items.text: overpitched just outside off, and he wedges a drive straight to backward point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, no run

items.text: length ball on middle stump, and nudged off the front foot to the leg side
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, no run

items.text: length ball angling away, and Rohit tries to cut square. Struck supremely well, but finds the point fielder on this occasion
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, no run

items.text: full on leg stump, and comfortably clipped off his toes to the fielder at fine leg
items.postText: Mir: "Bangladesh cricket fans, do you guys like or appreciate the NAAGIN dance performed by your players? "
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: back of a length just outside off stump. Sticks his bat out and steers it past backward point for a single
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Rayudu, 1 run

items.text: classic Rohit pull! Short on off, and he uses the incoming angle to smack this right over the square-leg boundary. Excellent way to end the over
items.postText:
Khaled: "@Mir, its a celebration style by Nazmul Islam. Just like any other players would have. Whats there to like or dislike it?"

Mahmudur : "We appreciate it. Celebration is part of the game."
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, SIX runs

items.text: full just outside off, and driven back to Nazmul off the front foot
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Rayudu, no run

items.text: good length just outside off stump. Rocks back to punch down the ground to mid off
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Rayudu, no run

items.text: good length on off once again. Fneded off the back foot to mid off for a single
items.postText: mohit: "Ok, call me old school. I am scared by Donald's face-cream; love Ponting's bouncy walk-in; find Inzy's non-chalance and Wasim's action; and Tendulkar's unbelievably cold hard stare (when he did pull it out). Nagin dance...not so much. "
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Rayudu, 1 run

items.text: full just on middle stump. Defended off the front foot.
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Sharma, no run

items.preText: Dipu: "Hi..For your kind information Naagin dance is default celebration of Nazmul Islam.. don't take it personal..he is not trying to mock .. "
items.text: length ball on middle. Angling into his pads, and nudged off the back foot to the leg side
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Sharma, no run

items.text: full on off, and he caresses a front-foot punch to wide long off for a single
items.postText: Vulcan: "@Mir Do you like the thigh smack thing that Dhawan does when he catches?"
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: back of a length outside off, and he defends with soft hands off the back foot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sharma, no run

items.text: full on leg stump, and pushed off his pads past the fielder at midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: edged! Length ball outside off, and moving away after hitting the deck. Rayudu tries to drive for the ball that comes in, but this does enough to beat his bat and also take a feather-touch off it! A more sedate celebration from the experienced Mashrafe
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Rayudu, OUT

dismissal.text: AT Rayudu c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Mashrafe Mortaza 2 (7b 0x4 0x6) SR: 28.57

items.text: full on leg stump, and Karthik comes down the ground in a bid to flick this square. But the ball goes down leg for a wide
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, 1 wide

items.preText: one slip still in place for the new batsman
items.text: length ball on off, and angling into his body. Worked off his hips to the leg side
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, no run

items.text: good length on off, and angling inwards again. DK tries to flick this off his pads again, but he's deceived by the slower ball. Hits his front leg, but the ball would definitely have missed the stumps
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, no run

items.text: length ball on middle, and tapped off the front foot to midwicket. Tight call for run, but they manage to scamper across. Gets off the mark
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off stump. Karthik goes onto the back foot, and then cuts this in front of square to deep extra cover
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Karthik, 1 run
